feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:00 a.m. EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 10:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: SW 13 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
